channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Priest (Blue Dragon)
channel.description:
**Priest** _Blue Dragon Support_
Passive: Unique - This is a unique class.
Night Ability: Resurrection - Choose a Blue Dragon to bring back from the dead back to their regular class. This will be exposed to the court. (1)
Additional Information: If somebody gets brought back it will say “[name] [#] was brought back from the dead!”
Converted Into
**Minister** _Unseen Support_
Passive 1: You Know Who We Are - The Unseen Members will show as their real name to the dead Unseen.
Passive 2: Nobody Can See Me - The dead will not see the messages you type.
Passive 3: Go Away Psychic! - Psychic will not see that there is a Minister in the dead chat.
Day Ability: Medium - Choose to let the Unseen talk to the dead Unseen members. (5)
Additional Information: None.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Priest (Blue Dragon)
item.dc:creator: Scath
item.description:
In Town of Salem, Retributionist can confirm up to four town members and can revive the most powerful roles in the game. It confirms the retributionist, the revived town, and any mediums that exist, preventing evils from fake claiming it. Imagine having a fourth of court being automatically confirmed, with other auto-confirming classes.

Retributionist is still useful as it confirms a spot in the limited rolelist and your vote can still be the winning factor. It’s sometimes referred to as RetriBrokenist.

That’s my argument. Also known as; This is way too OP. This and Retributionist are the complete opposite of weak and “sucky” and terrible.

Also, the dead can say information like who an evil is or if the psychic has been converted.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Priest (Blue Dragon)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
I’ve played Town of Salem and Retributionist sucks since it’s one shot and then you do nothing. Also the revealing part.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Priest (Blue Dragon)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
This is an awful idea … I wasn’t playing this game when Priest was there, but in Town of Salem it’s OP because it confirms TWO BLUE DRAGON to the ENTIRE COURT. On top of raising someone from the dead …

Read full topic

Resurrection - Choose a Blue Dragon to bring back from the dead back to their regular class. This will be exposed to the court. (1)

Borring and swingy. We tried this on the old Priest and it was the reason she was removed.
